extendedInfo.description: Note: Destiny is only available in English!IMPORTANT:Save games from the demo will NOT port over to the full version of the game!* Story *The town of Oakvale is a small and peaceful town in the Old Forest, its inhabitants work hard tending the fields and the town is bursting with commerce and trade. And as far as man can remember, the dungeon gate has stood at the head of town, filled with powerful beasts and glorious loot! Many adventurers before you have embarked on the grand journey of harvesting the dungeons wealth, yet none have lived to tell the tale. Might you be first the defeat the dungeon lord that lurks beneath? And collect the bounty that all others dream of? Step forth adventurer! Will this be your Destiny?* About *Destiny is a 3D hack & slash dungeon crawler that features randomly generated levels, items, monsters, quests and a ton more of content that is sure to bring hours of enjoyment to the player!

reviews.title: Game just keeps getting better
reviews.comment: I originally rated the demo of this game 3 stars and expressed my concerns why. The developer was very open to input and suggestions and made things were fixed right away. Since then i\'ve purchased the full version and am really enjoying the game. I\'m also really looking forward to future plans that are coming. Yes there are some small issues but these are things that the developer is aware of and taking care of them in priority order. Overall this diablo meets dungeon siege game is lots of fun
reviews.author: Binary Michael

reviews.title: Demo
reviews.comment: Playing the demo version so far liking it , but having problems using the magic ,
reviews.author: david eeles

reviews.title: Amazing potential
reviews.comment: This really caught my eye and after playing the demo I found the concept a winner. What totally spoils the whole experience is the horrible controls. I tried I really tried but I often found my thumbs in the middle of the screen blocking my line of sight. It is the only thing stopping me from buying the full version. Such a shame because I would give it five stars for effort
reviews.author: RAF Dahouk

reviews.title: 3 Stars for Effort
